lyrics:
I need to keep you around, with my feet tied
With my feet tied tight to the ground
The end's nowhere to be found, I don't know why
You don't leave me to drown, oh, oh, oh

Don't know where to go unless you say
Don't know what to do unless you stay
Thinking that today will be our day
Be our day again

Why am I playing with time as it's ticking away?
It's tickin' away, away, I'm asking
Why we run for our lives, not a second to waste?
You're tickin' away, away, away

Alright, let's get it
Winnin' (winnin'), losin' (losin'), either way I'm there
Gotta attitude, I'm out the roof up in the air
This round I make it count, yeah, I'm talkin' right now
Feel like the comeback kid, I got no time to spare

Woah, double up the score, turn a two to a four
You know I win a lot, gotta win one more
On a hot streak, never gets old
Solo with the ace, and my team went gold

Why am I playing with time as it's ticking away?
It's tickin' away, away, I'm asking
Why we run for our lives, not a second to waste?
You're tickin' away, away, away

You're ticking away, away, away

You're ticking away, away

I'll give it one more try
I don't know why, but I keep coming back every time
I want it more than my life
I don't know why, but it feels so right

Why am I playing with time as it's ticking away?
It's tickin' away, away, I'm asking
Why we run for our lives, not a second to waste?
It's tickin' away, away, away

It's ticking away, away, away

Ticking away, away, away
imageDescription: A determined athlete with glowing eyes, bathed in bright stadium lights, triumphantly raising a trophy as confetti rains down. A surreal clock face melts behind them, time swirling and distorting, emphasizing the pressure and urgency of the game. Dynamic composition, gritty and energetic style.
